before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fjb0u","text":"Prepare 4mg/mL collagenase solution before start and place on 37C shaker to dissolve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.group_name: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2bjke","text":"1% Antibiotic","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aqkvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"64pmj","text":"DMEM\/Ham's Antibiotic","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2b531","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1atr1","text":"DNAse","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":5,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cdvpq","text":"1mg\/mL DNase in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"82t5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"51B45CD0C00E11E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":666956,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Prepare {"blocks":[{"key":"8nclo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"41ilu","text":"Transfer tissues to 150cm plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"es8ub","text":"Wash with large quantities of PBS to remove blood and old storage media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cul8d","text":"-Ammount of PBS varies depending on vloume of tissues washed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9spo4","text":"Aspirate off PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f0ai2","text":"Repeat PBS wash twice, for a total of three washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85n9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dcjme","text":"Collect small pieces of tissues for FFPE or OCT Blocks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"46l82","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"7247DE50C01C11E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":667011,"previous_id":666956,"previous_guid":"51B45CD0C00E11E8BA4AC904C05712DB","section":"Initial Tissue Preperation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ddgv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"v474","text":"Use two number 10 scaple to chop tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9qs61","text":"Chop tissue until epithelial tissues are about 2-3mm in size. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ar7rj","text":"-Depending on stating tisues sample, removal of excessive adipose tissues will help in the chopping and digesting process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"63AF1D60C01F11E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":667030,"previous_id":667011,"previous_guid":"7247DE50C01C11E8BA4AC904C05712DB","section":"Mechanical Dissociation of Tissue"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g9rr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a153h","text":"Transfer anout 20mL in volume of chopped tissue to each 50mL concial tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"728as","text":"Add 20mL of DMEM with 5% FBS with 4mg\/mL Collagenase Type I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9e2gp","text":"Place on 37C shaker at about 180-200rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1tqe2","text":"Leave on heated shake for 12-16 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9epdv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0CA621D0C02411E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":667057,"previous_id":667030,"previous_guid":"63AF1D60C01F11E8BA4AC904C05712DB","section":"Enzymatic Dissociation of Tissue"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1c7fb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1qakv","text":"Centrifuge tubes at 400gx5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5t3i4","text":"Aspirate to remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"25v7i","text":"Wash with 50mL of PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9bsh9","text":"Centrifuge at 400gx5min to remove PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bvpm9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"42F1D220C02411E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":667060,"previous_guid":"0CA621D0C02411E8BA4AC904C05712DB","section":"Organoid Collection"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l0u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"88m0b","text":"Add 2mL of 0.05% Trypsin to pellet of organoids.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ga77","text":"Place at 37C for 6 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5dmoq","text":"Take tube out every 2 minutes to pipette up and down with P1000, for a total of three times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b8a4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8935r","text":"Add 10mL of DMEM with 10% FBS to tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8bem6","text":"Centrifuge at 400gx5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4qe9d","text":"Aspirate off supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3eji3","text":"Resuspend pellet in 1mL of DMEM with 10% FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5qk9m","text":"Add 100uL of DNase, incubate for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"df1ka","text":"Add 10mL of DMEM with 10% FBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b0evq","text":"Centrifuge at 400gx5min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8a87p","text":"Remove supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b9ooc","text":"Resuspend in 10mL of DMEM with 10% FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7ehe3","text":"Count cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6vfh9","text":"Centrifuge at 400gx5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e5qsv","text":"Bring back up to appropirate concentration for FACS staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"305js","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7h84n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"A9885540C02411E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":667068,"previous_id":667060,"previous_guid":"42F1D220C02411E8BA4AC904C05712DB","section":"Single Cell Preperation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sdec","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9tia3","text":"Prepare appropirate tubes for FACS staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"diiah","text":"To all tube add the following antibidies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7fqpn","text":"-PE-CD49f","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1vnr4","text":"-APC-EpCAM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3261l","text":"-DAPI-CD45\/CD31","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f8b68","text":"--Use antibody concentraion suggested by manfacture. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fd3jm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d37e8","text":"Stain for 20min at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aa7c","text":"Take out and wash cells with DMEM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7ftb","text":"Pass through FACS tube filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"215uc","text":"Before sort begins add SytoxGreen to tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"91dm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3d64b","text":"Sort  for all live cells, anything that is SytoxGreen negative. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bor7s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"3D1B6A90C02511E8BA4AC904C05712DB","id":667091,"previous_id":667068,"previous_guid":"A9885540C02411E8BA4AC904C05712DB","section":"Single Cell FACS Preperation"}
